languages.text: "///Преследование. Вторжение. Повсюду. В каждом уголке. Обрывы. Вытеснение. Изгнание?"

traits.locale_text: "///Преследование. Вторжение. Повсюду. В каждом уголке. Обрывы. Вытеснение. Изгнание?"

languages.text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"
languages.original_text: "///Преследование. Вторжение. Повсюду. В каждом уголке. Обрывы. Вытеснение. Изгнание?"

traits.locale_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"
"///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"
"///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"
"///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"
"///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

languages.text: 「///迫害。侵入。どこでも。隅々まで。切断。転移。追放？」
languages.original_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

traits.locale_text: 「///迫害。侵入。どこでも。隅々まで。切断。転移。追放？」

languages.text: “///迫害，入侵，无处不在，在每个角落。切断，更改，放逐？”
languages.original_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

traits.locale_text: “///迫害，入侵，无处不在，在每个角落。切断，更改，放逐？”

languages.text: "///Verfolgung. Eindringen. Überall. An jeder Ecke. Abschaltung. Verdrängung. Verbannung?"
languages.original_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

traits.locale_text: "///Verfolgung. Eindringen. Überall. An jeder Ecke. Abschaltung. Verdrängung. Verbannung?"

languages.text: « ///Persécution. Intrusion. Partout. Dans tous les recoins. Coupures. Déplacement. Bannissement ? »
languages.original_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

traits.locale_text: « ///Persécution. Intrusion. Partout. Dans tous les recoins. Coupures. Déplacement. Bannissement ? »

languages.text: «///Persecución. Intrusión. Por todas partes. En cada rincón. Bloqueos. Desplazamiento. ¿Destierro?».
languages.original_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

traits.locale_text: «///Persecución. Intrusión. Por todas partes. En cada rincón. Bloqueos. Desplazamiento. ¿Destierro?».

languages.text: "///Zulüm. İzinsiz giriş. Her yerde. Dört bir yanda. Kesintiler. Göçüş. Sürgün?"
languages.original_text: "///Persecution. Intrusion. Everywhere. At every corner. Cutoffs. Displacement. Banishment?"

traits.locale_text: "///Zulüm. İzinsiz giriş. Her yerde. Dört bir yanda. Kesintiler. Yerinden etme. Sürgün?"
